entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023
